question:
If \(g(x) = \frac{x^2(4x+9)}{(3x-3)(x+2)}\), for which of the following x values is g(x) undefined?
Indicate all such values of x.
A. \(-\frac{9}{4}\)
B. \(–2\)
C. \(0\)
D. \(1\)
E. \(2\)
F. \(\frac{9}{4}\)
